title: SkyMenu
description: There is a service called SkyMenu in the information room. In this service, each student has an account, and by logging in to it, they can save the works in the class. However, many people leave the password of this account as the initial value (the same as the user ID), so this is a project to collect and enjoy it. Here you go. (※ Almost cracking, don't imitate)
description_ja: 情報室のSkyMenuというサービスがあります。このサービスでは、生徒それぞれにアカウントが存在し、それにログインすることで、授業内での作品を保存することができます。しかし、このアカウントのパスワードを初期値のままにしておく（ユーザーIDと同じ）人が多いので、それを集計し、楽しむというものです。それではどうぞ。（※ほぼクラッキング、マネしないでね）

details.caption: SkyMenu
content: SkyMenu is a web development project that allows users to create and manage their own menus.
content_ja: SkyMenuは、ユーザーが自分のメニューを作成して管理できるウェブ開発プロジェクトです。

details.caption: How to Crack
details.caption_ja: クラッキングのやり方
content: There is a way to run it with bat, but it became uncontrollable, so I will introduce a way to run it with python, which is slower to execute and still within the range of being manageable.
Run this to install the necessary modules.
Then, copy and run this code.
Now you can crack the SkyMenu menu.
Our school has about 300 students in each grade. After trying all of them,
125 people were found not to have changed them. It's vulnerable, isn't it?

details.caption: Mechanism
content: The mechanism is simple. It takes a screenshot of the page with pyautogui, moves the mouse to a place that matches the image of the button taken in advance to some extent, and clicks it.
These three button images are recognized. The rest is done with the tab key, etc.
content_ja: pyautoguiで、ページのスクリーンショットを撮り、事前に撮っておいたボタンの画像とある程度適合するところにマウスを持っていき、クリックします。
これら三つのボタンの画像を、認識しています。それ以外はタブキーなどです。
